moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Credentials Local Administrator Password Solution
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will recover the LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) passwords,
        configured in Active Directory, which is usually only accessible by privileged users.
        Note that the local administrator account name is not stored in Active Directory,
        so it is assumed to be 'Administrator' by default.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.

options.name: LOCAL_ADMIN_NAME
options.description: The username to store the password against
